name: Classic Americano
description: Rich espresso with hot water for a smooth, robust coffee.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup, marked with espresso and caramel drizzle.

name: Espresso Shot
description: Intensely bold and flavorful espresso shot with a golden crema on top.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Moist, fluffy muffin filled with juicy blueberries.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic combination of rich espresso topped with frothy milk foam.

name: Chai Latte
description: A creamy blend of spicy chai tea and steamed milk.

name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing and delicate green tea sourced from the best picks.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Freshly brewed coffee served over ice for a crisp, cool taste.

name: Lemon Poppy Seed Cake
description: Light and zesty lemon cake dotted with poppy seeds.

name: Vanilla Bean Frappé
description: Iced blend of coffee, milk, and rich vanilla bean flavor.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Steamed milk with chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Finely ground matcha green tea mixed with steamed milk.

name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
description: Toasted bagel served with a generous spread of cream cheese.

name: Vegan Banana Bread
description: Moist banana bread made with wholesome vegan ingredients.

name: Iced Matcha Tea
description: Chilled matcha tea, lightly sweetened and served with ice.
